properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.longDescription: This charming semi-detached house offers spacious living across two floors. Ground floor includes a bright living room, dining area, modern kitchen with breakfast nook, conservatory overlooking the garden, utility room, and downstairs cloakroom. Upstairs, three generous bedrooms (master with built-in wardrobes), family bathroom, and separate WC. Exterior features a private driveway, garage, and mature rear garden. Ideal for families, with excellent transport links and local amenities. Energy efficient with double glazing and central heating. Viewing highly recommended.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...
properties.longDescription: Modern ground-floor flat in pristine condition. Open-plan kitchen/living area with high-end appliances (dishwasher, washing machine), solid wood floors, and bi-folding doors to a private courtyard gardenâ€”perfect for entertaining. Two spacious double bedrooms, en-suite wet room to master, and family bathroom with shower over bath. Additional features: walnut doors, Sky TV wiring, ample storage. Built 5 years ago with remaining 10-year guarantee. Secure entry, parking available. Close to amenities and transport in Orpington.

properties.description: Stunning four-bedroom detached house in a sought-after North London area. Features include a large open-plan kitchen/diner, two reception rooms, home office, and en-suite master bedroom. Beautifully landscaped garden and double garage. Close to parks and excellent schools.
properties.longDescription: This impressive detached family home spans over 2,000 sq ft. Ground floor: Entrance hall, spacious living room with fireplace, separate dining room, modern kitchen with island and integrated appliances, utility room, study/office, and guest WC. First floor: Master bedroom with en-suite shower, three additional double bedrooms (one with balcony), family bathroom. Exterior: Private driveway for 3 cars, double garage, south-facing garden with patio and lawn. Benefits: Solar panels, underfloor heating, smart home tech. Prime location near tube stations and green spaces. Perfect for growing families.

properties.description: Cozy one-bedroom apartment in vibrant South East London. Open-plan living/kitchen, modern bathroom, and balcony. Ideal for first-time buyers or investors. Excellent transport links.
properties.longDescription: Compact yet stylish studio-style flat perfect for urban living. Features an open-plan lounge/kitchen with fitted units and appliances, double bedroom area, contemporary bathroom with shower. Small balcony for outdoor space. Building amenities: Secure entry, lift access, bike storage. Leasehold with 120 years remaining. Low service charges. Walking distance to shops, cafes, and Overground station. Great rental potential or starter home.

properties.description: Grand five-bedroom Victorian house with period features. Multiple reception rooms, large kitchen, cellar, and extensive garden. In a prestigious West London neighborhood.
properties.longDescription: Elegant period property restored to high standards. Ground floor: Two reception rooms with fireplaces, dining room, bespoke kitchen with Aga stove, conservatory, WC. Basement: Cellar/storage. First floor: Master suite with dressing room and en-suite, two double bedrooms, family bathroom. Second floor: Two more bedrooms, shower room. Exterior: Off-street parking, 100ft garden with summer house. Features: High ceilings, original cornices, hardwood floors. Close to parks and top schools. A true family heirloom.

properties.description: Spacious four-bedroom penthouse flat with river views. Modern interiors, two bathrooms, roof terrace. In a secure development with concierge.
properties.longDescription: Luxury top-floor apartment in Docklands. Open-plan living/dining/kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows and balcony overlooking the Thames. Master bedroom with en-suite, three additional bedrooms (one as home office), second bathroom. Private roof terrace for BBQs. Building perks: 24/7 concierge, gym, underground parking. Leasehold with 999 years. High-speed broadband. Minutes from Canary Wharf for shopping and Jubilee Line. Ideal for professionals or families seeking city convenience.

properties.description: Charming one-bedroom cottage in quiet South West London suburb. Open-plan layout, small garden, perfect for singles or couples. Renovated recently.
properties.longDescription: Quaint end-of-terrace cottage with modern updates. Combined living/kitchen area with French doors to patio garden. Cozy bedroom upstairs with built-in storage, contemporary bathroom. Features: Gas central heating, double glazing, off-street parking. Freehold. Low maintenance garden with shed. Near local shops, parks, and train station to central London. Affordable entry-level home with character.

properties.description: Stunning three-bedroom duplex apartment with private terrace in East London. Contemporary design with floor-to-ceiling windows, modern kitchen with island, and two luxury bathrooms. Secure gated development with communal gardens and gym facilities.
properties.longDescription: Exceptional duplex apartment spanning two floors in a modern riverside development. Ground floor: Open-plan living/dining area with integrated kitchen featuring Bosch appliances, guest WC, and access to private terrace (approx 25 sqm). First floor: Master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and built-in wardrobes, two additional double bedrooms, family bathroom with bath and separate shower. Features: Video entry system, underfloor heating, oak flooring, allocated parking space. Development amenities include 24-hour concierge, residents' gym, and landscaped communal gardens. Leasehold with 985 years remaining. Excellent transport links with Stratford station nearby.

properties.description: Beautifully renovated two-bedroom terraced house in desirable Richmond. Period features combined with modern conveniences. Private rear garden, off-street parking, and short walk to Richmond Park and town center.
properties.longDescription: Charming Victorian terraced house thoughtfully modernized throughout. Ground floor: Entrance hallway with original Victorian tiles, bright reception room with bay window and feature fireplace, extended kitchen/diner with bi-fold doors opening to garden, utility area. First floor: Two spacious double bedrooms with period features including high ceilings and large sash windows, contemporary family bathroom with rainfall shower and freestanding bath. Exterior: Low-maintenance rear garden with decking and lawn area, front garden with parking for one car. Additional features: New boiler, rewired electrics, double glazed windows, wooden flooring, close to Richmond station with direct links to central London. Perfect for young families or professionals seeking village charm with city access.
